    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Reading the Qur'an &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078757">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078757">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078757">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078757">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078757" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078758">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078758">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078758">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078758">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078758" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078759">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078759">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078759">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias (good for topic-generating and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078759">
          <p>
           <em>
            &nbsp;
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Cambridge Companion to the Qur'an
            <br />
           </em>
           On reserve at Trexler Library. 297.1226 C178
           <br />
           Longer essays.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Encyclopaedia of Islam
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library Reference 297.03 E56o
           <br />
           Older, but a classic.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://0-infotrac.galegroup.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/itweb/mul_coll?db=GVRL">
            <em>
             Encyclopedia of Religion
            </em>
           </a>
           <br />
           The standard reference for religion studies.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Encyclopedia of Religion and Ethics
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library Reference 203 H357e
           <br />
           Pre-dates
           <em>
            Encyclopedia of Religion
           </em>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Encyclopaedia of the Qur'&macr;an
            <br />
           </em>
           Trexler Library Reference 297.12203 E56o
           <br />
           Fully documented, scholarly.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Oxford Encyclopedia of the Islamic World
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library Reference 909.0976 O98e
           <br />
           Scholarly introduction to the world of Islam.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Oxford History of Islam
           </em>
           <br />
           On reserve at Trexler Library. 297.09 O98h
           <br />
           Longer essays.
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Shorter Encyclopaedia of the Islam
            <br />
           </em>
           Trexler Library Reference 297.09 S559
           <br />
           Much-abbreviated version of
           <em>
            Encyclopaedia of Islam
           </em>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078759" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078760">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078760">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078760">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078760">
          <div id="boxatt17078760" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130873">
              <a id="link_20130873" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130873,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading the Qur\'an', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078761">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078761">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078761">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Online books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078761">
          <div id="boxatt17078761" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130874">
              <a id="link_20130874" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130874,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading the Qur\'an', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19973860}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Offers previews of books, with link to interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078762">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078762">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078762">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078762">
          <div id="boxatt17078762" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130900">
              <a id="link_20130900" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130900,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading the Qur\'an', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               A subscription database. Standard index for religious studies. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130902">
              <a id="link_20130902" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130902,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading the Qur\'an', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12812497}); ">
               Sociological Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for sociology. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078763">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078763">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078763">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078763">
          <div id="boxatt17078763" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130881">
              <a id="link_20130881" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130881,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading the Qur\'an', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130882">
              <a id="link_20130882" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130882,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading the Qur\'an', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our Journal Locator (see above) to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642650" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078764">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078764">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078764">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078764">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For help in writing annotated bibliographies, visit Purdue's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           <font size="2">
           </font>
           for a
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/general/gl_annotatedbib.html">
            definition
           </a>
           of an annotation and
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
            samples
           </a>
           using APA and MLA styles.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078764" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078765">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078765">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078765">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078765">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078765" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
